#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n;
	string temp;
	cin>>n;
	getline(cin,temp);
	while(n--)
	{
		string encode,map;
		getline(cin,encode);
		getline(cin,map);
//		cout<<encode<<"\n";
	//	cout<<map<<"\n";
		int l = encode.size();
		for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
		{
			if(encode[i]>='A'&&encode[i]<='Z')
			{
				int t = encode[i]-65;
				cout<<map[t];
			}
			else
			cout<<encode[i];
		}
		cout<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
